name: Minor Scale
description:
Minor Scale is a rhythm-based tower defense game with a 2D / 3D hybrid whimsical aesthetic. YOU the player will conduct a band of cute little Critters to defend their jam session from the creepy Crawlies threatening their home with the power of music.

- Unique combination of rhythm and tower defense mechanics
- Place critters to defeat the crawlies by playing along with the music
- For lovers of rhythm games, tower defense, and cute creatures
- Hit notes to earn a crescendo
- Defeat crawlies to place more critters to earn currency
- Original soundtrack
- Start your waves on your own time
